questions.question: What is the time complexity of BFS on a graph?
questions.explanation: BFS visits each vertex and edge once, resulting in O(V + E) time complexity.

questions.question: Which algorithm finds the shortest path in weighted graphs with non-negative weights?
questions.explanation: Dijkstra's algorithm finds shortest paths in weighted graphs with non-negative edge weights.

questions.question: What data structure is typically used in Dijkstra's algorithm for efficiency?
questions.explanation: Priority Queue (Min-Heap) is used to efficiently extract the vertex with minimum distance.
